summary: The AI Training Extension Act of 2025 amends the Artificial Intelligence Training for the Acquisition Workforce Act. It expands AI training within the executive branch, focusing on acquisition positions, management officials, supervisors, and data/technology positions. The bill redefines key terms, outlines the components of the AI training program, specifies who is responsible for the program, and adjusts the program's content and review process. It also amends the short title of the original act.
